sentences.english: Good reliability-It takes advantage of fieldbus technique and error code test function.
sentences.chinese: 高可靠性，它採用了現場總線技術並有誤碼效驗功能。

sentences.english: System crashes can result in inconsistent parity by interrupting write operations.
sentences.chinese: 系統崩潰可能導致寫操作時數據效驗的不致性。

sentences.english: We are making big reforms and are achieving somewhat better results now.
sentences.chinese: 我們進行了重大改革，也幾多有些效驗。

sentences.english: Internet is a powerful tool for improving logistical effectiveness and efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網是提高物流效率和效驗的壯大工具。

sentences.english: Additional assessments in higher order species must be accomplished to corroborate efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 在更高的目種的附加的評價必須被完成贊助效驗。

definition: to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1

definition: to feel the pulse (TCM)/Taiwan pr. [zhen3 mo4]
to spend the whole day eating (i.e. not doing any work)
hard to tell if it's real or sham
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to be neither too familiar nor too distant/to keep sb at arm's length
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
